I can do coding things!

Here's the mpg dataset:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(plotly)
mpg %>% 
  kable() %>% 
  kable_classic(lightable_options = 'hover') %>% 
  scroll_box(width = "500px", height = "200px")

p <- mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x= displ, y= cty)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
ggplotly(p)

round(mean(mpg$cty), 2)

```
<br><br><br>
